title: Striped fashion font
content:
Anyone know this font?  
I've had a similar font of this but it wasn't as delicate as this one.  
It could be custom, but I've seen a font like this that wasn't custom made. Seen it in a couple of fashion ads (maybe it wad for armani).

Thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120424143247im_/http:/typophile.com/files/MG_4776.jpg)
author: 1UP

comments.content: It's not quite [Prisma](http://web.archive.org/web/20120424143247/http:/www.google.com/search?q=site:typophile.com+prisma) but it's close.

Thanks Stephen.  
Maybe I can try with Prisma and customize it.

EDIT: Wasn't that easy + it was bigger differences than I first thought. Any other suggestions for this font?
